::sagefirestorm lands with the group::

SageFirestorm-Beast Mode

::he turns into the red wolf with blue stripes::

Sagefirestorm-Ready

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pod Computer-Touchdown in 3..2..1

::the escape pod crashes,when it does the mechanism to scan for a 
beast mode activates::

Voice-WHy wont it slagin open what the woaahhh

::his voice is overtaken as the emergency life finder scans a eagle 
swwoping down on a cheeta::

Voice-What happened

::the pod opens::

Computer-Location locked egypt

Necro Enari-Necro Enari to all aviable predacon units,i am in the 
desert of Egypt and im looking for the preda...

::his visuals lock on to the predacon base::

Necro-All bots on the predacon vessel i am aproaching your ship i am 
warrior from cybertron and wish to join your ranks over and out

::In his eagle/cheeta mode he gets a good running start and leaps 
into the air for the predacon base::
